mapper.insert: insert into user(id, pass, name, phone,email,birth,user_nickname) values(#{id},#{pass},#{name},#{phone},#{email},#{birth},#{user_nickname})
insert into usermarket(pk_user, title, price, content, filename) values(#{pk_user},#{title},#{price},#{content},#{filename})

insert into booking(pk_booking, pk_wanted, pk_user, pk_mybike, pk_company,book_date, price, memo, regdate) values(#{pk_booking},#{pk_wanted},#{pk_user},#{pk_mybike},#{pk_company},#{book_date},#{price},#{memo},#{regdate})
insert into company(addr, comp_id, comp_pass, introduce, pk_company,tel) values(#{addr},#{comp_id},#{comp_pass},#{introduce},#{pk_company},#{tel})
